title: Bug 114903: Default values are not shown in 'Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: When report parameters are created and default values are set, the default values are not displayed in the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog.
EB: The default values of the report parameters should be displayed in the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create several report parameters.
2. Set default values for the report parameters.
3. Drag the report parameters to the layout.
4. Open the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog and verify if the default values are displayed properly.
